title: <:diamond_shape:1013899470867537990> VIP
description:
The <@&1000878258037989436> role is given to those who **purchase 3 or more** products that are under the name of Returned Studios.

**Perks**
- Embed Links in discussion channels
- Attach/Send files in discussion channels
- Talk in available threads
- Play Activities (Discord games) in voice channels
- Request to speak during active stages
